product.title: Fool’s Gold | Disney Book Club by Early Moments
product.text:
Fool’s Gold

Alaska’s breathtaking scenery sets the stage for this imaginative tale, centered around the adventures of Mickey Mouse and Goofy. While on a relaxing fishing trip in Alaska, Mickey and Goofy mistakenly think they have struck it rich, but soon discover that all that glitters isn’t gold.

Tie-in Activity: Set up a backyard “panning” station using sand and kitchen strainers. Hide marbles and other small trinkets in the sand, and let your child pan for treasures.
